CHAPTER 4 
SYSTEM DEVELOPMENT
 
51 
 
Figure 4.4: PHP Database Connection Diagram 
 
4.2.1.2.2 Image-Tag App Details 
 
 
Our app efficiently loads and displays images sourced from a 
specified directory, presenting them in a user-friendly interface tailored 
for seamless labeling. This interface allows users to input accurate labels 
directly, with the entered data promptly saved into the database for 
streamlined data management. 
 
 
Figure 4.5: Main Page of Labeling APP
